de.polygonal.ds.DLLNode

type
class
A doubly linked list node. Each node wraps an element and stores a reference to the next and previous list node.

Constructor

new(x : T, list : DLL<T>)
parameters
val The value to store in this node.
list The list that manages this node.

Instance Variables

next : DLLNode<T>

The next node in the list being referenced.

prev : DLLNode<T>

The previous node in the list being referenced.

val : T

The node's value.

Instance Methods

append(node : DLLNode<T>) : DLLNode<T>

returns
The lists's new tail node.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError The node is managed by a list (if debug flag is set).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is null, managed by a list or this node has a next node (if debug flag is set).
Appends node to this node assuming this is the tail of the list. Useful for updating a list which is not managed by a DLL class.
Example: 
	  var a = new DLLNode<Int>(0, null);
	  var b = new DLLNode<Int>(1, null);
	  var tail = a.append(b);
	  trace(tail.val); //1
	  trace(tail.prevVal()); //0

appendTo(node : DLLNode<T>) : DLLNode<T>

returns
The list's new tail node.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is null, managed by a list or node.next is not null (if debug flag is set).
Appends this node to node assuming node is the tail of the list. Useful for updating a list which is not managed by a DLL class. Example: 
	  var a = new DLLNode<Int>(0, null);
	  var b = new DLLNode<Int>(1, null);
	  var tail = b.appendTo(a);
	  trace(tail.val); //1
	  trace(tail.prevVal()); //0

getList() : DLL<T>

A reference to the list that owns this node.

hasNext() : Bool

Returns true if this node has a next node.

hasPrev() : Bool

Returns true if this node has a previous node.

nextVal() : T

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Next node is null (if debug flag is set).
Returns the value of the next node.

prepend(node : DLLNode<T>) : DLLNode<T>

returns
The list's new head node.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is null, managed by a list or this node has a previous node (if debug flag is set).
Prepends node to this node assuming this is the head of the list. Useful for updating a list which is not managed by a DLL class.
Example: 
	  var a = new DLLNode<Int>(0, null);
	  var b = new DLLNode<Int>(1, null);
	  var head = b.prepend(a);
	  trace(head.val); //0
	  trace(head.nextVal()); //1

prependTo(node : DLLNode<T>) : DLLNode<T>

returns
The list's new head node.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError node is null, managed by a list or node.prev is not null (if debug flag is set).
Prepends this node to node assuming node is the head of the list. Useful for updating a list which is not managed by a DLL class. Example: 
	  var a = new DLLNode<Int>(0, null);
	  var b = new DLLNode<Int>(1, null);
	  var head = a.prependTo(b);
	  trace(head.val); //0
	  trace(head.nextVal()); //1

prevVal() : T

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Previous node is null (if debug flag is set).
Returns the value of the previous node.

remove() : DLLNode<T>

Removes this node from the list and returns the next node

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.
